titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the School of Architecture, Yale University, Reminiscences and Memorabilia of Students in the Classes 1948-1958
School of Architecture, Yale University, Reminiscences and Memorabilia of Students in the Classes 1948-1958
titlestmt.author: compiled by Richard Szary and Mary Caldera

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:37

did.unittitle: School of Architecture, Yale University, reminiscences and memorabilia of students in the Classes 1948-1958

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The material, assembled by Estelle Margolis and Walfredo Toscanini, consists of reminiscences, student and later work, course materials, and articles by former Yale architecture students who graduated from 1948 to 1958.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 18-H (YRG 18-H), Audio-visual materials and memorabilia documenting the School of Art and Architecture.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The material was a gift of Estelle Margolis and Walfredo Toscanini, 2004 and 2005.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: School of Architecture, Yale University, Reminiscences and Memorabilia Students in the Classes 1948-1958 (RU 961). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The material, assembled by Estelle Margolis and Walfredo Toscanini, consists of reminiscences, student and later work, course materials, and articles by former Yale architecture students who graduated from 1948 to 1958.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by year of graduation or type of material.
